markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2191)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 115 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272), this black hooded lantern has gray glass and lenses that emit a pale gray light when the lantern is lit. Anything this light falls on looks gray or desaturated. The lantern uses [oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=38) as a [standard hooded lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29). The lantern's light shines within the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9) as well as the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1). On any other plane, the light functions as a normal hooded lantern.

<document level="2" id="action-1689" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghost Lantern
